title: M2: Machine Learning - A More Advanced Definition
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 5 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Encourage your students to define the task, the measure of performance and to conceptualise how previous experience can be captured for a process like machine translation. When it comes to evaluating performance, bleu is clearly not the only metric developers can use to check whether their machine translation engines are improving with repeated training, but it is still the most commonly used automatic metric in machine translation development. Encourage your students to think of other metrics and their relative strengths.
